mapper.select: select sc.* from step_classification sc right join step_book_classification_ref bcr on sc.id = bcr.classification_id where bcr.book_id = #{bookId}

select b.*, (select array_remove(array(select sc.classification_name from step_classification sc right join step_book_classification_ref bcr on b.id = bcr.book_id and sc.id = bcr.classification_id ), null)) classifications, (select count(1) from step_book_chapter bc where bc.book_id = b.id) chapter_count from step_book b where b.id = #{bookId}
select b.* from step_book b left join step_book_set_book_ref bsb on bsb.book_id = b.id left join step_product p on p.book_set_id = bsb.book_set_id where p.id = #{productId}
